extension.summary: Night is a beautiful, clean and Fanart focused Skin for Plex. Created by Mcborzu, PHC port by Maverick214, PHT port/mod by bkury
extension.description: (Mcborzu) Night started as a project for myself to learn skinning but quickly evolved into a full skin. It's main features include: TV Show Logos, Bigger Episode thumbs, more realistic 3D thumbs in some views, all while having fast window transitions. Amongst many features just a skin that tries to do things differently...
extension.disclaimer: More info on the skin can be found at the Plex Forums.
